title: Database Administrator
description: DataCore is seeking a Database Administrator to manage our database systems. You'll optimize performance, ensure data integrity, and implement security measures.
responsibilities: Design and implement database administrator solutions that meet business requirements
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices
Contribute to documentation and knowledge sharing
requirements: 3+ years of experience in database administrator or similar role
Strong knowledge of PostgreSQL, MySQL, Database Design
Experience with Performance Tuning and Backup/Recovery
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience)
nice_to_have: Previous experience in a similar industry
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
